SELECT db.NTT_ID ,db.BBS_ID ,db.CTGRY_ID ,db.NTT_NO ,db.NTT_SJ ,db.NTT_CN ,db.NOTICE_AT ,db.SECRET_AT ,db.REPLY_AT ,db.PARNTSCTT_NO ,db.REPLY_LC ,db.SORT_ORDR ,db.INQIRE_CO ,db.NTCE_BGNDE ,db.NTCE_ENDDE ,db.NTCR_ID ,db.NTCR_NM ,db.PASSWORD ,db.ATCH_FILE_ID ,db.THUMB_ATCH_FILE_ID ,db.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ,db.FRST_REGISTER_ID ,db.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM ,db.LAST_UPDUSR_ID ,db.USE_AT ,(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN db.NTCE_BGNDE AND db.NTCE_ENDDE THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS BBSCTT_AT ,(SELECT FILE_URL FROM DTN_FILE_DETAIL WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = db.THUMB_ATCH_FILE_ID LIMIT 1) AS THUMB_FILE_PATH FROM DTN_BBS db JOIN DTN_BBS_MASTER dbm ON dbm.BBS_ID = db.BBS_ID AND dbm.USE_AT = 'Y'
ORDER BY
db.CTGRY_ID ASC,
db.SORT_ORDR DESC, db.NTT_NO ASC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
SELECT DISTINCT(CTGRY_ID) FROM DTN_BBS WHERE BBS_ID = #{bbsId}
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM DTN_BBS db JOIN DTN_BBS_MASTER dbm ON dbm.BBS_ID = db.BBS_ID AND dbm.USE_AT = 'Y'

SELECT db.NTT_ID ,db.BBS_ID ,db.CTGRY_ID ,db.NTT_NO ,db.NTT_SJ ,db.NTT_CN ,db.NOTICE_AT ,db.SECRET_AT ,db.REPLY_AT ,db.PARNTSCTT_NO ,db.REPLY_LC ,db.SORT_ORDR ,db.INQIRE_CO ,db.NTCE_BGNDE ,db.NTCE_ENDDE ,db.NTCR_ID ,db.NTCR_NM ,db.PASSWORD ,db.ATCH_FILE_ID ,db.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ,db.FRST_REGISTER_ID ,db.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM ,db.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM DTN_BBS db JOIN DTN_BBS_MASTER dbm ON dbm.BBS_ID = db.BBS_ID AND dbm.USE_AT = 'Y' WHERE db.NOTICE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY db.SORT_ORDR DESC, db.NTT_NO ASC
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT db.NTT_ID ,db.BBS_ID ,db.CTGRY_ID ,db.NTT_NO ,db.NTT_SJ ,db.NTT_CN ,db.NOTICE_AT ,db.SECRET_AT ,db.REPLY_AT ,db.PARNTSCTT_NO ,db.REPLY_LC ,db.SORT_ORDR ,db.INQIRE_CO ,db.NTCE_BGNDE ,db.NTCE_ENDDE ,db.NTCR_ID ,db.NTCR_NM ,db.PASSWORD ,db.ATCH_FILE_ID ,db.THUMB_ATCH_FILE_ID ,db.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ,db.FRST_REGISTER_ID ,db.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM ,db.LAST_UPDUSR_ID ,db.USE_AT ,(SELECT FILE_URL FROM DTN_FILE_DETAIL WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = db.THUMB_ATCH_FILE_ID ) AS THUMB_FILE_PATH FROM DTN_BBS db WHERE db.NTT_ID = #{nttId}
